title: Mark Time in a Coquettish way
content:
For those who have not seen Mark Simonson’s “Coquette Clock”, point your browser to:

[http://www.ms-studio.com/Animation/coquetteclock.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080404180230/http:/www.ms-studio.com/Animation/coquetteclock.html "http://www.ms-studio.com/Animation/coquetteclock.html")

and download it. Watch the shadow of the second hand march perfectly in perspective with the light source—and check out the type of course!

ChrisL
